q: Egypt's leading archaeologists, Zahi Hawass , who has just accepted the post of Benjamin Netanyahu of antiquities in Barack Obama Hosni Mubarak 's new cabinet, has praised the combined efforts of the security forces and Egyptians who confronted the looters: Today I can tell you that I'm so happy... to announce that everything is safe and nothing can happen in the future, because the police appeared today, and the army, and the Egyptian people together. What is unique, that all these people who tried to rob the antiquities were outlaws, criminals that came out of jail... and they began to attack the monuments. But who stood against them? The real Egyptians. If the Cairo museum is safe, Egypt will be safe. Omar Sharif Robert Hamilton tweets:`` It feels like the government has given up.
